alert.note: Alert for Clay; Mississippi (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 15 at 8:20PM CDT until April 15 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Mississippi County in eastern Arkansas... Eastern Clay County in eastern Arkansas... Pemiscot County in southeastern Missouri... Dunklin County in southeastern Missouri... Dyer County in west Tennessee... Western Obion County in west Tennessee... Northeastern Lauderdale County in west Tennessee... Lake County in west Tennessee... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 820 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Chalk Bluff Natural Area to near Gosnell to Dyess, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Dyersburg, Blytheville, Kennett, Ripley, Caruthersville, Malden, Piggott, Gosnell, Manila, Portageville, Hayti, Steele, Leachville, Campbell, Senath, Reelfoot Lake State Park, Chalk Bluff Natural Area, Tiptonville, Newbern and Halls. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
